client.Records

Class RecordServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Records.RecordServices

extends java.lang.Object
    This function handles ecverything related to the records on the client side.

    • Method Detail

      • createRecord

        public void createRecord(int courseID,
                         int examYear,
                         java.io.File record,
                         int donatingUser)
        This method creates a RecordType to send to the server. It encapsulates every parameters.
        Parameters:
        courseID - the ID of the course from which the record originated.
        examYear - the year the exam was given.
        record - the actual file.
        donatingUser - the user that donated the record.

        This method send to server the request to have the records
